calculator.intro: Here are the impacts of the salmon industry around the world since you opened this web page.

join.title: Be the change.
join.intro: There are alternatives to salmon in our way of eating, selling, and producing.
join.content: France, located in the top 3 of the largest consumers of salmon in the world, bears a particular responsibility in guiding practices.
join.act: To reverse the trend and stop the disaster, urgent action is needed. We have levers for action!
